name: HttpsRedirect
short_description: All the affected HTTP calls perform a redirect to its HTTPS counterpart before processing the call

documentation.description:
This plugin will make all the affected HTTP calls perform a redirect to its HTTPS counterpart before processing the call.

By default the redirection is a `301 Moved Permanently`, but it can be configured to be a `302 Found` redirect.
documentation.options:
* `sslPort` -- The port to redirect to. By default 443
* `permanentRedirect` -- `301 Moved Permanently` if `true`, or `302 Found redirect` if `false`
